website_summaries.verdict: A solar-powered digital watch with atomic timekeeping for exceptional accuracy.
pros: Multiple features including an automatic calendar, atomic timekeeping, multiple alarms (including a snooze alarm), and countdown timer
The watch is also shock-resistant and has an auto backlight function that turns on with a flick of the wrist
cons: Auto backlight is not always fully responsive

customer_reviews.title: built to last forever
customer_reviews.text: hey everyone. just checking in here. it's February of 2018. I purchased my watch in 2013! 5 years and still running as good as new. it has been a daily wear item and has held up to mountain bike crashes, swimming in the ocean and daily baths. I have never had an issue with it. it is beat up, scared and scratched. it's been my trustworthy adventure buddy for so long I had forgot when I purchased it. if I lost this watch, I would replace it with the same model without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch.  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this watch, no problems and stays fully charged as I'm outside a lot. A little bigger than I'm used to but getting used to that and other people have complimented this watch alot. UPDATE-- I absolutely love this watch. And I have proven it's worth in money and strength. I have bumped and banged this watch around and it still looks new..I would say if you look at this watch you'll want it. Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent both look & feel and functions.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent both look & feel and functions. All functions perform as specified / instructed in Casio manual. You may download online for Casio manual for module 3179 to know ahead what this watch can do prior buying. In the back of my watch, manufacturing number is 302A323H. That means the watch is completed assemble and out of the assemby line on the day 323th of 2018. So considered it is brand new. See attatched datasheet picture. I like it. Five stars for all.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! Turn off the automatic light for the solar watches
customer_reviews.text: It's seriously a great watch, one of the most durable and reliable I have ever had. Keeps amazing time as it syncs every night. ***Just a note for people that work indoors or nights a lot or don't get a lot of sunlight, turn OFF the automatic light. It drains the battery pretty fast. I had it on and didn't even know it so the light turns on every time the watch is at a certain angle....great feature but it will die extremely fast if you don't get a ton of sunlight. I turned it off and it's lasted a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best G-Shock for the money with great features!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very useful and simple to use. Best parts about it: Solar Charging, MultiBand 6, and size is just right. Not too big and not too small. This is my 4th G-Shock, frankly it's my favorite... even though it's not the most expensive G-Shock I own.
customer_reviews.author: Zeka

customer_reviews.title: The solar and atomc time keeping!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the suddle grey print on the bezel not wery bright like the base DW-69001V! great all around watch,I may put the very nice GW-5000 strap on it,then you have the PERFECT WATCH,it does what you need no more or no less! I have been wearing casio G-SHOCKS FOR 30 YEARS OR MORE,and I really prefer the 6900 SHAPE OVER THE CASIO SQUARES! What are your thoughts of the squares verses the tough rugged look of the 6900 series? Steve in Los Angeles, CA.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN WINKLER

customer_reviews.title: After 9 years, it's still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for 9 years and it has never stopped. It still updates nightly and still illuminates. I have found that if the watch isn't getting enough sunlight the illumination will stop, but as soon as it gets refreshed it's back on. Phenomenal watch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KAV

customer_reviews.title: Bought in May 2014 and still find as of 08/2018
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in May 2014 before thru hiking the 2100 mike Appalachian Trail. I have worn this watch while thru hiking the Pacific Crest Trail in 2015, took it to over 19000 foot altitude in Tibet, trekked around Annapurna, and on and on. The watch does sometimes need to recharge from the sun, so if it goes blank don’t freak out. I still have the original strap on it, but am going to try a Velcro replacement band because after 5 years I would like to change (a little). Great watch and a testament to Japanese engineering.
customer_reviews.author: PoPoBawa

customer_reviews.title: The backlight is very nice and is a great shade of blue
customer_reviews.text: Seamless transaction and fast shipping. It arrived synched and charged to 'Mid'. I've also confirmed that atomic synch will occur if I sleep with the watch on. The backlight is very nice and is a great shade of blue. This one now competes with my GA-700 for wrist time, even though the GA-700 is pricier. It is my "go-to" work watch. I work security at a large retailer and this watch has performed admirably. I wouldn't hesitate confronting accused shoplifters or getting physical with this watch on my wrist. There's a reason the military and first-responders choose G-Shock - accurate time and supreme durability.
customer_reviews.author: bigpatvoodoodad

customer_reviews.title: My everyday watch, super tough solar watch!!
customer_reviews.text: My everyday watch love the bold simple look and the fact that can wear it in the water with no issues. Solar is great although now in winter I can see it needs more light to get to full charge but no issues I put it on window sill every so often (once a month) for an hour and it’s fine!! Great watch for the money super durable I use it doing yard work and I’m not easy on watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best watch I have ever owned.  This is my second one after losing the first.
customer_reviews.text: Want a watch that minds itself and always has the right time? Want to forget about batteries or winding it? Want to see it at night? It is simple to use and sets itself to the international time standards so it is always accurate. It uses light energy hitting its solar cell to capture energy to run. Stopwatch? YUP! Timer? YUP! You also get global time for where you are. Don't hide it up your sleeve or it will not stay charged. Show it off. It is also a bit bulky but worth it. It can stand abuse and can live in the water with you. But, I still remove it when I shower. Near perfection...
customer_reviews.author: M. Kolesar

customer_reviews.title: Issue with tough solar function
customer_reviews.text: This is the second GW6900 I have purchased off Amazon and this is the second one that has had an issue charging. I have had many G shocks that have had the Tough Solar function and with the exception of this model, they have all worked flawlessly. This watch, even when left in direct sunlight for hours does not receive a full charge or move to the high level at all. When testing the solar panels they would rarely indicate receiving energy from artificial light and never did it indicate receiving energy from direct sunlight. Everything else on this watch seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so cool and functional: - G-Shock - Good size for small-medium wrist - Build quality is high - Buttons are super easy to use, while still being protected - Stop Watch start-stop and reset buttons being on same side makes it more usable - Easy to read from many angles - The band is soft and also more calmed down, less ornamented (I subjectively like this way) - The ayes are functional, except the big one which adds a sparkle of style and entertains eye at times - Looks much better then in Amazon photo - Being solar with power level indicator makes it dependable tool - Time Zones can be set both direction, forwards and backwards
customer_reviews.author: Ivane

customer_reviews.title: Watch died after just less than 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this watch but now that I know these watches are disposable toys, I should have gotten the cheaper version which costs half as much. Especially since the the government decided to shut down the atomic clock radio in N.America in 2019. As such, there is no reason to spend any extra money for the 'Atomic Clock' feature if you live in North or South America.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch. Display is incredibly easy to read (not ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic watch. Display is incredibly easy to read (not all digital G-shocks are). Super tough - mine has taken an incredible beating and has been flawless. Wear it everyday, and I have a very intense and demanding line of work. I kick the hell out of watches, and they break (not this one). Very light weight. Very comfortable. Great size; not too large and not too small. I make sure it gets plenty of light, and it has never left "high" charge. For the price, this is an unbeatable G-shock.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: No maintenance beater.
customer_reviews.text: Had one of the original of this watch years ago and loved it. Actually found that gshock was not invunerable. However, no watch ever made would have survived so.... Very happy with this watch. Nice that it has been upgraded with solar power and auto adjust. The best improvement is that 2 of the eyes now serve a purpose. Of course the far right eye is still a ten second clock. Very handy for all those ten second tasks we have every day right. 😀 I am going to be very happy with this no maintenance beater.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Perfection for outdoor/tactical activities
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2015, taken on missions trips, travel, swimming, construction projects in and out of the country. If you’re looking for a watch to survive the apocalypse that you don’t need to baby then this Gshock rises above all others! Solar + multiband 6 time setting makes this watch the best possible functionality combination versus other Gshocks. I have other watches for other occasions, but for outdoor activities or travel, this is my GO-TO! It’s one of the best choices in tactical timepieces. If you're buying a G-Shock, make sure it has "Tough Solar" and "Multi-band 6". Those are legit versus the others without those functions. No worrying about batteries, or if the time isn't exactly right.
customer_reviews.author: E. in VA

customer_reviews.title: Quality digital solar watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I put it in a window for 4 hours. Went to high charge and has not gone below that level since. I have the power saver on because I really do not need the light going on every time I bend my wrist. Having a power meter on a watch is great. No guess work in how much charge is left. The watch looks average size on my 8 inch wrist. Has everything necessary for a functional tool watch: timer, stopwatch, alarms (5) and dual time zones (I don't use that feature). The atomic synchronization is cool, but I do not know of too many instances where that level of precision is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small wrist -> my dad measured my wrist at 6.5 inches around. The watch fits great, I wear the watch with the silver lock thing on the 5th to last hole on the watch band. Atomic time keeping works great. Its battery is solar charged. The manual states it will last 9 months before completely dying. Just sit the watch on your window sill on a sunny day and it will charge in maybe 3 or 4 hours. Great quality for only about 85 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: A really good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My G-shock sorta played out after nearly ten years, so I bought this one. Like my previous, this is an excellent watch. Does everything I want it to do. I feel sure it will be just as durable and reliable as my last. Agree with one of the previous posters - mine arrived charged only mid. But after three or so days, in and out in the Texas sun. it is now fully charged. Not too large for my wrist, and doesn't look wimpy either. A great buy, again. And....price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Genuine, Made in Thailand, Doesn't come in G Shock metal tin.
customer_reviews.text: This G Shock does not come in a metal tin! This G Shock is maid in Thailand. I thought it would have a tin. It came in a cheap box. The watch is genuine and works well. I have a 7 1/2 inch wrist and it fits well and is not too small. I live in California and the atomic time keeping works great. If you have trouble getting it to update hang the watch from a metal bar. I used my pull up bar and I know it sounds crazy but it wouldn't update inside until I hung it from my pull up bar.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!
customer_reviews.text: The watch works very well, and it's exactly what I was looking for! I have several complaints, but they're not big enough to detract away from my 5 star evaluation of a great watch: - Sometimes the band can be a little difficult to take off. - Sometimes there's a little bit of residue that builds up on various parts of the watching, including the outer edges of the screen. - Just recently the "RCVD" (signal received thingy) function to auto-sync the time stopped working. No idea why, still not working. Edit: they seem to have fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Extremely convenient
customer_reviews.text: This watch is SOLAR. This watch updates the time via a RADIO SIGNAL to an ATOMIC CLOCK. This watch is a G-SHOCK. This makes for a super-convenient, bombproof watch. I have a charge 2 and countless other watches, but I find myself reaching for this as I run out the door - I never have to worry about battery or about having the incorrect time/date. Casio could sell this for twice the current price and it would still be a good value, in my opinion. It looks nice on the wrist, too.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely great watch! It was a gift for my younger brother. I wanted to get him a watch that he could wear and forget about setting it or replacing batteries. I own two Multiband 6 watches from G-Shock, one being GW-6900BC. I love both of mine and I had to get a Multiband 6 for my brother. He's in love with the watch! If your on the fence just get it you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Hec79

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for YEARS. I've never had to change the battery thanks to the built-in solar panels. This is the watch I wear 99% of the time because it simply doesn't quit. I doesn't matter how hard it gets banged against something, how much swimming (in salt water) I do, or how much dirt/mud gets on it. The light always works, the functions always work, it's always the right time, AND the face hasn't even scratched. If you're on the fence, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: William the Great

customer_reviews.title: Uncompromised Strength and Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Great price. Fast delivery. Two sets of user instructions; first one in Spanish second one in Spanish. No problem downloaded English version on internet. Recommend viewing YouTube tutorial for visual setup how to. About 10 minutes to set watch and BAM, ready to roll. Atomic setting kicked in after first night of setting watch. Excellent accuracy. Purchased my first GShock in the 80s. Have never had a problem with their watches. GShock tough!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: If you own one G-Shock...get this one
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a watch. It’s not too big and bulky and has everything you would want in a watch without adding stuff like a compass, etc. The Multi Band 6 and Tough Solar complete it and are great to have. Sync’s with the Atomic clock in Ft. Collins, Co automatically starting at midnight and will try again until 5am. The 6900 has a great history and is one of the best selling G-Shocks. Great buy, durable, and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: strong68

customer_reviews.title: My everyday/go-to timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best G-Shock under $80. It looks sleek and the size is just right. The band feels nice on the wrist and it’s not too stiff. I only charged this thing once. I made a mistake of leaving it too long on the dash of my car for a few hours. The screen went blank for a moment but came back when it cooled down. It’s been on High for the past 1.5 years and it’s not even on power saving mode. Beast! The Multi Band 6 feature is nice to have as I currently live in Japan while also doing a few trips to NA every now and then. A must have to your G-Shock collection!
customer_reviews.author: AssertDominance

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding watch!
customer_reviews.text: This has the exact combination of features that I’ve been looking for in a daily watch: extra durable, simple to use, and dependable. It also looks interesting and unique. Sized right been the rangeman 9400 and the DW-5600 (the classic square), it’s lightweight like the smaller 5600 but wears smoother and flatter than the 9400-you can actually wear it under shirt sleeves. The watch is also very comfortable to wear, and unlike the more feature-rich rangeman, you won’t even notice that you are wearing it. The perfect watch.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Tough watch: Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great working watch! I bought this over a year ago, and I'm very pleased with the quality of this watch. It has pretty much continuously received the atomic signal, and the battery's been on HIGH since a couple of days after I bought it. I have just one complaint: The mineral display somehow managed to get a couple of scratches on itself, which is surprising, considering how elevated this watches's sides are. Otherwise, the watch has retained the same functionality and quality since the day it was bought. (it also went down a couple of dollars in price.)
customer_reviews.author: Fayge

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need and nothing you don't
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rangemaster that has an altimeter, baramoter, compass, and thermometer. Guess how often I use those functions? Never. Take away those features and you have this watch. Solar powered? Check. Atomic timekeeping? Check. Alarm, stopwatch, timer? Check. This watch is G2G. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Spingarn

customer_reviews.title: Wrong watch shipped- disappointed in seller.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this watch. I loved the original version and liked the idea of tough solar. TI received a different watch then the one pictured and listed. The box says GW 6900, but that is not what I received and will be returning. This stinks because I ordered it for a trip and now I will not be able to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid outdoors man, very rough on stuff. The watch is durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Its a Casio
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Solar charges the battery so never have to worry about the battery. Easy to read and program as this is not my first Casio. If this is your first its top notch , especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal watch for me
customer_reviews.text: I use crutches to walk so watches get shocked and bumped quite often. This watch is built to take it. The accuracy is great by getting info from US time standard. I got negative face first and couldn't read it but this face is easy to read. With calendar built to function until 2099 is nice even though I'll be dead way before then. My favorite watch now.
customer_reviews.author: JP Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Takes abuse
customer_reviews.text: I've not worn a watch for many years. My wife decided she was not happy that each time I needed to check the time, I pulled my phone out. She got this for me for Christmas. I love it. Keeps accurate time, easy to operate, and nice looking. Rugged as well. The reason I stopped wearing watches was because I consistently broke them. I'm a bit hard on watches for sure. So far it has withstood my abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Best watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak highly enough about this watch. Going on 6 months of use. The charge is always on high and it updates itself every night I put it in the window ledge. I swim with this watch at least 4 days a week and stands up to the chlorine. Couldn't ask for more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Twelker

customer_reviews.title: Another good looking and durable Casio G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't do this watch justice. In person this watch looks fantastic, it's styling grows on you everytime you look at it! The functions and features are basically standard for every mid priced solar/multi band 6 G-Shock. This is another classic Casio that's been around forever, it's just a good looking watch that can get abused and still function. Overall if you like G-Shocks and want a lower priced yet solid watch, consider this watch or any of Casio's other lower cost G-Shocks. They're all just as durable and built with topnotch materials.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicEndurance80

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression.
customer_reviews.text: My first G-Shock. So far I love the watch. I wanted something simple that was well built and this fit the bill perfect. The watch feels solid and has held up to some bumps and bruises. I have an average size wrist and the watch is not too large, as I was first concerned. I also love the solar feature of the G-Shock. The battery has not moved from high charge. I wear the watch daily and spend most my time indoors. So far very impressed with the watch and would recommend to anyone looking for a nice basic watch that is not too large and can stand up to daily use and abuse.
customer_reviews.author: christopher u

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: The main features I was looking for was solar charging and atomic timekeeping. This is perfect. I'm old school and not into those new smart watches.
customer_reviews.author: Bcool

customer_reviews.title: One tough watch
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a watch last me more than a year without the band breaking or something going wrong. Not this one. One year later going strong and still looks brand new. I don’t shower in it, but its been swimming countless times in a pool and in the ocean. Everyone says phones replace watches but when you are in the water and anyone wants to know the time they will ask you.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars-would buy again/worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's not super heavy Edit: 2 yrs later I got this watch because I was tired of replacing $20 ( and under) watches that continually broke within 3 months of purchase. After looking at reviews, I bought my first $100 watch. Now? Still no cracks, no scratches, and i found its easy to clean. I have no regrets, it functions correctly, never had the power run out (I never actively try to charge it) and it's simple to change the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: No Tin Can?
customer_reviews.text: I have owned G-Shocks forever. No complaints about the watch. But I was disappointed in the packing. First of all, the watch looked a little dirty, like it may have been a return or floor model. Also, it was shipped in a cheap dented cardboard box mounted on a plastic display stand. Thats a first for me. All of my Casios came in a tin can. Considering this was a $100.00 watch I expected the tin. I get the feeling this was a return or floor model.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wear and forget
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a watch I could wear and never page attention to. Something I could shower, swim, workout and never have to change the battery or set the time. Something that would conceivably last longer than me but not be expensive. A tall order but this watch meets all of these requirements and more. Durable, shock and water proof enough to survive almost any condition (even a little light diving). Solar powered and atomic clock setting precision. The wrist band will probably be destroyed before the watch itself but even then it will probably last a decade before I have to replace it. Pretty close to a perfect wear and forget timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Damon G. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: A Low Drama Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: In a market that seems saturated by high-maintenance smart watches, Casio's G-Shock remains a trusted standby. The GW6900 does not text, give weather reports, or take pictures BUT it provide the time and date with remarkable efficiency. I have used my GW6900 for the past year in West Africa. The watch is durable, the solar is reliable, and the light provides a clear view of the display. There is nothing fancy about the GW6900 but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch I purchased for use overseas. The instruction book is lacking so I went online and found a great video showing all the functions of the watch. The only issue I've had is the watch adjusting for Day Light Savings time (yes, I live in the South). This may be due to a setting I've missed, but thus far this is the only issue I've had. The watch is rugged (it's a daily wear when I'm doing yard work, etc.) so it takes a beating and has held up well. It arrived quickly and I thought the price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Best G shock out there hands down. I was worried that I'd have to leave it exposed to direct sunlight more than on my wrist but honestly i have not felt the need to deliberately charge it. It does that on its own through daily activities and its not like I'm out all the time and even then, it's grey skies where i am from this time of year.
customer_reviews.author: camilo parra

customer_reviews.title: Big watch
customer_reviews.text: When the watch came, the instructions were in Spanish. I had to download the instructions off the website. They were confusing. For a couple of days I couldn't get the right time, but it synced up with the clock in Colorado, and has been fine since then. The watch is big, and the readout doesn't cover the whole face. It could have a bigger readout. But it's been very accurate and has all the functions I want without a bunch of other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: robert Weinstock

customer_reviews.title: solar feature is amazing
customer_reviews.text: i have no negatives to say about the watch except that the weight is little bit heavy for the size but thats just a nitpick, its indestructible, i use it for diving, mountain biking, fishing, and hunting, it never fails, always has power due to solar charging and the atomic time keeping makes it convenient. good job casio
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Although, the packaging was not very impressive but the watch overly impressed me. Two key factors I bought this watch was that it tells the time accurately because , never needs battery change, and the charging cells look cool when the watch is placed against the sun. This atomic solar watch sets its time using a radio signal that is broadcast from the atomic clock at the Fort Collins, Colorado-based National Institute of Standards and Technology. This watch will not disappoint anyone. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Gaitan

customer_reviews.title: great watch,not too big
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my humble collection,wanted an atomic but thought gshocks were too big.This one isnt too big on my 7.5" wrist. Thanks to the online reviewers who helped clarify the size issue. I can recommend the youtube tutorial by "watch geek" as v.good for simplifying the initial setup of the watch functions you choose to use.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: It's a great value and time keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Casio products and never been disappointed. This watch is a great daily watch, no batteries to replace the first one after 8 years still keeps time but the buttons have failed to reset the time. So I ordered another one and I'm happy again😀
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Watch-  It matches All my outfits- and the Solar Battery Will last Forever
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Watch. This watch is quality made. The solar panels make up the black face and the dials above the time are a nice flat green. It looks very expensive and seems to match any outfits I want to wear. Some of the G Shock Watches in the past have looked big and flashy and something the younger people would wear- but Casio got it right this time and made something that would appeal to the older crowd too.Its the best looking G Shock I ever had. The Solar Battery will last forever as long as you expose it to sun or bright light at least one time per week
customer_reviews.author: DSR WALK

customer_reviews.title: This Watch will Never Fail You.
customer_reviews.text: Used this watch for 3 years now. It went with me to basic training for 6 months in the army. It was amazing. In the snow, in the mud, dragged on concrete. Its "bulletproof". I still wear it everyday. In the shower, when i sleep. It never leaves my wrist and it has never been off, keeps accurate time.
customer_reviews.author: Thatguywhohikes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ppl who don’t like the massive G-Shocks
customer_reviews.text: This watch is perfect! Looks so much better in person than the pics online. I bought several to try out (gd350-8, and the dw9052). The gd350 was much too large and thick to be practical for every day use. This size is perfect for my HVAC job and also wear it to the gym. The solar and atomic clock makes this a great purchase. Don’t hesitate to buy this watch This watch hardly leaves my wrist and since the first day of wearing it hasn’t gotten off high charge. Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a relacement for a similar model I purchased in 2002. I've worn a G-Shock all over the world working in oilfield services and in varying climates. They're durable, reliable and have great functionality. I have several but this will be the primary tough duty/work watch so we'll see how it holds up. It gets the 5 stars based on my overall experience with the products and my first impression of the one I received.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent on a watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first g-shock so I went with the iconic 6900 style and I am very pleased. A week later I purchased another just for GP. A month later I purchased a 5610 g-shock, now I’m a HUGE G-SHOCK FANBOY. A frogman g-shock is my next purchase. Do yourself a favor and buy this watch or any of the solar g-shocks it’ll be the best money you ever spend on a watch. G-shock is so good that this is also my FIRST EVER REVIEW.
customer_reviews.author: Benji W.

customer_reviews.title: Casio is addicting.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it says plus it's a tough solar and 6 band so you don't have to set it or worrie about battery dying on you. Should've been the last watch I needed but I loved it so much I bough a square GW5610.
customer_reviews.author: samsiteone

customer_reviews.title: Still love it! Just make sure to give it some time in the window.
customer_reviews.text: So I still love this watch I've been wearing it daily since I got it. I swapped out the stock band for a NATO one almost immediately. The only problem I have is during Michigan winters when we're stuck inside and there isn't much much sun in general you have to make sure that to take advantage of the sunny day's that you do get. I suppose this would be true in any place where you have limited sunny days but it's an easy thing to work around.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Features and functions are fine but when the battery is dead after less than 4 months its useless. Purchased Oct 17 and "LOW" displayed for 1 day and now dead !!
customer_reviews.author: A6 Intruder

customer_reviews.title: Very good watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use during his basic military training. It held up very well to tough conditions and is still "ticking".
customer_reviews.author: DAVID CLUFF

customer_reviews.title: works great, no problems keeping it charged
customer_reviews.text: working great for 3 months now. battery charge level has been at high consistently since about 6 weeks after I started wearing daily. only sun light it's getting is when I drive and about 15-20 of walking outside each day. i do turn off functions that I don't need that saves me some power, such as the sound, daily time sync, and auto light function.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Duan

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good on my small wrist
customer_reviews.text: This is my second G-shock and I think they are rock solid. I have small wrist and most G-Shocks are to large for me but not this one. If size is a concern (to large) this one is not an issue. Looks really good on my small wrist. I love the style and simplicity and function. Rugged, good looking and great fit , what more could you ask for. Oh yeah price- reasonable. I'm well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ALGAB

customer_reviews.title: One of the best watches I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch about 7-10 years ago and it's still ticking strong. One of the best watches I've ever owned. You can't go wrong with this watch. The backlight is super strong and doesn't look cheap. Watch is solid. No discoloring either.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Super comfortable on the wrist, snooze alarm that's loud enough to wake me up but not so loud as to shock me out of bed, solar, tough as nails, atomic time keeping. This is a fantastic sport watch.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great value maintenance free G-Shock WIN-WIN
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch the only thing I don’t like is how amazon lowers the damn price by 12 bucks a half hour after I paid for mine. Since there is no price matching anymore you can pay 88 bucks for this watch just for it to drop to 76 bucks literally seconds later. But overall this watch is an awesome value and I regret nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Box opened
customer_reviews.text: Everything works so far. I've had it for 2 days. I'm hoping the battery doesn't run out then not charge like some people have experienced with these watches. The box was slightly opened but there's no damage to the watch. I have a small wrist so It looks kind of big but i dont care i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: 1 seconds if not better. Syncs reliably
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate time piece. When checked against IRIG clocks, the clock matches within .1 seconds if not better. Syncs reliably, and after a good soaking in sunlight after receiving it, has shown full charge through the winter months. I am sure when summer comes around it will stay full charge all year long. I do not use many of the other functions so that would change the rate at which the battery charge drops.
customer_reviews.author: dukes

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Keeps perfect time. Charges great with Polar power. It is a rugged watch you don't have to worry about. I get my atomic signal every night. For the price you can not beat it. I love watches and this is my favorite. Not the best looking, but very accurate as far as keeping time.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Wolf

customer_reviews.title: YOU want this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually not a shill...but this watch perfectly combines value, atomic time keeping, and durability. I believe it to be one of the best G-Shock values out there for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch.  Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: My first G Shock back in the 80's was the 6900. I now have the same watch I loved so much from back then in solar/atomic. You cannot beat it for $75. I have 6.5" wrist and this watch is perfect for me. If you are looking for a practical, tough time piece, you won't do better than this classic...
customer_reviews.author: John and Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with faint alarm.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch with one exception - the alarm volume is EXTREMELY FAINT! Otherwise, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Red Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Solar Casio Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 G-Shock watches and was looking for the best deal when my current one began to look a little beat up, and the wrist band was splitting. I like the all black or dark grey watches and am not into a lot of colors, so this fits the bill. It has all the features I like to use, particularly the timer, and it is $80 cheaper that the model I have, so I decided to give it a try. It is smaller and lighter than my old one, which I like, too. To be able to get a good-looking Tough Solar G-Shock at this price is great!
customer_reviews.author: GaryL

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought one for someone else
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I got it for Christmas, and I liked it so much that I bought it for my brother in law for his birthday. 2 Year Review: I love this watch, I wear it for all of my outdoor activities. I wear it very often. I've never had to replace the batteries, the band is still in perfect shape. I've replaced nothing on this. The one I bought for my brother is exactly the same. He has worn it every day since he got it. We are both outdoorsy and the go people. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: ben campbell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased similar Casio watches. This one is quite nice, with all the features I want, plus many more. Atomic timekeeping and Solar powered were the main features in which I was interested. I manually tested the atomic receiving feature and it worked the first time. I was wearing the watch, sitting near a window (North facing). I like to take this watch on vacations, since the world time makes it easy to switch back and forth to local time.
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Just works...always
customer_reviews.text: I have a few expensive, to me, watches that people gave to me for birthday's, graduation, etc. But THIS watch is my favorite and I bought it for myself because I needed something that worked and worked everywhere. I don't wear watches daily, but this this always works when I put it on, always has the correct time, can take a beating, and is inexpensive. I honestly don't know why I would buy an expensive watch when it can't take half the abuse this thing can.
customer_reviews.author: Rayman

customer_reviews.title: Better than my last G Shock
customer_reviews.text: I paid $200 for another model that only lasted a few weeks. I'm shocked that this inexpensive watch has lasted so long. I love his watch, I beat the hell out if it and it keeps working. This is a keeper for sure, handles swimming, running the gun range and tactical drills.
customer_reviews.author: Randall BryanTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch. I have small wrists and usually prefer the 5600s. I was looking for something different and settled on this one. Although this one is bigger it doesn't wear too big to my eyes. I also have the g9000 and this one has a lower profile and may be a little bit wider but it doesn't weigh much so you can wear it but not really notice it.
customer_reviews.author: PCK

customer_reviews.title: Way, way too complex
customer_reviews.text: This watch arrived and, after skimming the HUGE instruction book, I realized it needed to be taken off periodically and placed in the sunshine---often on a window ledge. I wear one of the normal Casio G-shocks 24-7, and never take them off, unless it's to replace their garbage-y wrist-bands. This watch is terrific, if you happen to be a computer programmer! Otherwise, give it a skip!
customer_reviews.author: fred douglass

customer_reviews.title: All I can say -- this watch is awesome! It charges with a solar cell and sets ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say -- this watch is awesome! It charges with a solar cell and sets time 6 times a day through radio/cell towers. It is water proof, I kept it in a glass of water for a day! If you take it off during night time, the watch turns off. Once you put it on your wrist, it turns back on, if not, just shake your hand. All in all its a great budget G-Shock watch. It's not easily scratched with, simple daily activities.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Piglet

customer_reviews.title: G-SHOCK GW6900
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Precise time, charged immediately and time was already set up! I would never buy another Casio watch unless it has atomic time!!! Great investment which will last for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: These G-Shock solar watches are great in all respects. My previous one is still working but wanted to get a different design. Highly recommend if you don’t want to change batteries all the time!
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: great tough rugged watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great . . . I think. I love this watch! I've had one for years, but it finally died and i decided it was time to get a solar one. I wore it for a few days, and loved it. Only to find out it was the regular battery version. But i'm defintely going to keep ordering till i get the solar one! Cant go wrong with a G-Shock!
customer_reviews.author: ThatEvanTodd

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've always owned Casio G-Shock watches and this is by far the best one I've owned. Atomic timekeeping and solar charging (it charges without any problems in Seattle). You can't go wrong with this watch for a personal purchase or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Alan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this watch fits my wrist. I'm a G-Shock collector and have over 25 G-Shocks. Love the featured of this watch like the Multiband 6 and Tough Solar!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom V.

customer_reviews.title: Review for folks living up north
customer_reviews.text: I echo all the positive comments from other reviewers. This review is specifically about how solar works for folks living up north in the winter. I live in Anchorage Alaska and received the watch right around the winter solstice when sun is limited up here. The watch came with a mid charge on it. I turned the chimes off and kept it on battery save. It took a while for a sunny day to arrive, but one sunny day was all it took to get it up to high. Since then, I give it a hour of sun here and there, but otherwise it charges with lights at work and stays on high.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, simple, comfortable, solar power, perfect time all the time with multi-band 6. Excellent Casio quality. Have had it over a year and wear it everyday, no signs of wear yet. Can set backlight illumination to stay on for 1.5 or 3 seconds, many other solar powered G-Shocks illumination can't be changed and only stays on for 1.5 seconds (like the square face GWM5610-1).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple watch little bigger than expected but not terrible the band didn’t fit my wrist very well so I got another one but other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shae H.

customer_reviews.title: One fine sturdy, affordable watch
customer_reviews.text: The quality grade on this watch is fantastic. It has a solar panel so you would never have to replace the battery. It also is waterproof and It CAN withstand some pressure and forces. It certainly is attention getter as well. for that reason, I got mine stolen at school. WOuld totally buy again
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: First Rate
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch about a year now. It has any feature you could ever hope for including time in just about any city in the world. Time is always spot-on & reception from the atomic clock is reliable just about every night. Nice looking also and very durable. Always manages to stay fully charged. My other watch is an oceanus titanium radio/atomic receptor time piece that's also solar powered. It's maybe $750. I prefer this one because it offers more features & has more functionality. My friends have Rolexes. I joke that mine keeps better time & that I sold my Rolex years ago. This is a better watch than that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Great G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: Watch arrived fully charged in a metal G-Shock tin, it was set for my time zone but the time was not correct when it arrived so i left it overnight to see if it would update automatically as advertised. Next morning everything was set correctly including daylight savings. So far it has updated 4 out of 5 nights. If the update fails it uses the time from the last update, no problem. The size and weight are great for me, and i really like the face. I'm outdoors for work almost everyday and its shown no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: POMPANO JOE

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, the only reason i didn't give it a five is that even though I spent hour/ days in the sun it has never gotten above a 1/2 charge
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T. Verga

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Top notch quality. I love the look. I love the fact that I will never need another battery for my G-Shock. It was a little tough to get it to sync with the atomic clock at first, almost to the point of frustration. I just lucked into a good spot one night and the sync was completed. Fit, style and functionality are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: todd iams

customer_reviews.title: Practically indestructible.  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been shark diving, trekking through SE Asia, exposed to the heat of the Mojave and the cold of the Sierra Nevadas, banged it all up to hell and its held up perfectly. I swapped out the wristband for a maratac zulu 3 ring with adapters and its bulletproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B.

customer_reviews.title: Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Doesn't have any useless features that other watches come with, and it's a G-Shock!
customer_reviews.author: Arek Dudek

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this watch for over a year and I couldn’t be happier, I have another G Shock that is going on over 6 years, however the bad started to give out so I bought his one. This watch is very durable, and it is subjected to lots of abuse working on cars. It almost always syncs up with the world clock every night and works as advertised. I have a friend with this same watch and he also really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pyle

customer_reviews.title: G-shock unbeatable
customer_reviews.text: This piece is baddass. Got the old school look and feel with the new technology guts. And if you’re a g-shock lifelong fan like me - you already know you can’t kill this watch. Can’t believe they sell it so cheap
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Full of Features for the Long Haul!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my son who is in Marine Basic Training. I researched several watches, especially the Casio G-Shock line of watches. I was so impressed with the watch that I bought one for myself. The features that impressed me were the solar charged capability, the water resistance feature, and a 10 year battery life. I'm very impressed with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Janes

customer_reviews.title: Great All-Around Function & Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very useful and simple to use. Best parts about it: Solar Charging, MultiBand 6, and size is a bit small. This is my 3rd G-Shock, frankly it's one of my favorite... even though it's not the most expensive G-Shock I own. G-Shock and Casio pathfinder watches are the best in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: uh yep
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Been over 2 years now since I bought it for work. I work outside in the elements all year round, and this watch is tough as nails. Durable and solar powered so I never have to worry about the battery. But my favorite feature is the atomic time keeping. Never have to set it and the time is always on point.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Smith

product_meta.title: Casio Men's G-Shock GW6900-1 Tough Solar Sport Watch
product_meta.description: Born from a dream of "creating a watch that never breaks." It was over 30 years ago, a CASIO engineer won the battle against the laws of nature. He designed a watch that would resist centrifugal and impact forces, as well as high water pressure. Since then, the name G-SHOCK has become a byword for independence and pushing the limits. G-SHOCK watches are the most durable digital and analog-digital watches in the industry, trusted by military personnel, law enforcement, surfers and outdoor enthusiasts around the world. Along with this, G-SHOCK is highly touted in the fashion world, worn by icons in hip-hop, sports, and design. With limited edition collaborations being released often, you can always find a G-SHOCK that matches your personality and style.
feature_bullets: Shock-resistant watch featuring LED backlight with day, date, and time display
Additional features include multi-band six atomic timekeeping, world time, daily alarm with snooze, 12 and 24-hour formats, and solar power battery
41 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window.Size of case / total weight 53.2 x 50.0 x 17.7mm / 63g

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
